import React from 'react' import "./Profile.css"; import ava from "./img/profile-0-Enhanced-Animated.gif" import tree from "./img/tree.gif" import {Route, Link} from "react-router-dom"; import Edit from "./EditProfile"; import { auth } from './firebase'; import {database} from "./Database/Firebase" import { useState } from 'react'; function Account() { const [info , setInfo] = useState([]); const user = auth.currentUser; GetInfo(user.email); function GetInfo (usermail){ database.collection("User").get().then((querySnapshot) => { querySnapshot.forEach(element => { var data = element.data(); if (data.email == usermail){ setInfo(data); } }); }) } function UpdateInfo (usermail){ database.collection("User").get().then((querySnapshot) => { querySnapshot.forEach(element => { var data = element.data(); if (data.email == usermail){ setInfo(data); } }); }) } return (
